Posts.Content: I am 4 weeks post Davinci surgery/ Not sure if I should be drinking lots of water or only 2-3 glasses a day. Can I drink coffee alcohol etc. I am dry at nite but leak when walking bending etc. Tried doing the Keagels during the day and at nite. I think doing them early makes me worse with the leakage at nite??/. Just really tired of the depend and being wet??
Posts.Title: How much water should I drink post op

Posts.Content: Thanks much for the info!!
Posts.Title: How much water should I drink post op

Posts.Content: Thanks for the info. I am seeing improvement. i am doin kegels 2 times a day.

Posts.Content: Well i had robotic surgery in Nov. No complications. My surgeon had done 500 plus and had a very good rep so i felt good about him. I would highly recmd robotic to anyone!! 5 little holes in the belly vs cutting u open. No brainer for me. Good luk with yur procedure whatever u decide!
Posts.Title: Almost ready to decide: a few questions concerning Robotic versus Open surgery

Posts.Content: I was on active surv for 2 years. Grade 6 less than 5 percent. I just had surgery on nov 19th. Glad i did, The cloud over me has gone away. Good luck to you
Posts.Title: MRI results

Posts.Content: I was on active surv for 2 years. Grade 6 less than 5 percent. I just had surgery on nov 19th. Glad i did, The cloud over me has gone away. Good luck to you
Posts.Title: MRI results

Posts.Content: Hey Joe - I felt exacly like you do!! I met with all the specialists and for almost 2 years I was on AS. One day I was ok with it, the next I was freaking out about the cancer spreading. I realized that my quality of life was getting worse each month. I decided to have robotic surgery this past nov. It has worked well for me. Im doing fine and I dont think about cancer with every bite of food and 10 times during every tv program. My surgeon was great and I am wearing 1 pad a day now. I am 62 years old and my doc told me that now I can live until my heart stops not until my prostate cancer kills me1 Good luck with yur decision and God Bless. By the way my Gleason was 6 on the biopsy but 7 on the post op path.
Posts.Title: How do you process all the information?

Posts.Content: Hey stuntmole- I had the same feeling. Never really had to pee. It all came out inthe pads. I was worried but after about 10 days i started peeing a little more each day in the toilet. Nitetime got better first. About 6 weeks out i was doing well. I am almost 3 mos out now and I am down to 1 pad per day. Good luck to u

Posts.Content: I was on AS for 2 years and very depressed most of the time. I had robotic surgery on Nov 19 and I had a great path report. My PSA is zero today and I feel great. For anyone trying to make a descision for me it has improved my life greatly. Best of luck to everyone and Gods speed
Posts.Title: having surgery was right for me

Posts.Content: Thanks to all for your support and kind words!!!
Posts.Title: having surgery was right for me

Posts.Content: Originally Posted by Wilde Thanks, I am a month from surgery and scared sh!tless, it is good to here that things work out for many of you. I am 1 month out also. getting dry at nite but still leaking during day. Just hopin it gets better like all thes guys say it does

Posts.Content: I am 62 also. I was scared as heck for 2 years!! Had the surgery on nov 19th . Best thing i ever did. 1 small pad a day. Even got a semi erection . Do it and gods speed to you
